original: Andersson, Erik Hidmer, kyrkoherde, Grolanda, f. 28/6/05 i Malma, Ska- rab. il., av hemm:äg. S. P. A. o. Josefina Broilin. G. 34 m. Agda Jönsson. Barn: Bo f. 36. — Stud:ex. i Vänersborg 26, teol. fil. ex, 28, teol. kand. 30, prakt. teol. prov samt prästv. f. Skara stift 31. Pastorsadj. i Vara 31, kommin. i Särestad 33, kyrkoh. i Grolanda o. Jäla sed. 39.
translated: Andersson, Erik Hidmer, clergyman, Grolanda. Born on June 28, 1905 in Malma, Skaraborg county, the son of a landowner, S. P. A. and Josefina Broilin. Married in 1934 to Agda Jönsson and had one child named Bo born in 1936. He completed his high school education in Vänersborg in 1926, earned a degree in theology in 1928, became a theology candidate in 1930, and passed his practical theological exam and was ordained as a priest in the Skara diocese in 1931. He worked as a pastor's assistant in Vara in 1931, a curate in Särestad in 1933, and became a vicar in Grolanda and Jäla in 1939.

education.name: Prakt. teol. prov samt prästv. f. Skara stift 31
